articles.title: Nomadland Sweeps BAFTAs As Women Filmmakers Triumph - NDTV
articles.description: The US road movie "Nomadland" triumphed at the Bafta film awards on Sunday, with Chinese director Chloe Zhao's intimate portrayal of marginalised Americans winning in four categories including best film, best actress and best director.

articles.title: Music and acting worlds react to death of rapper DMX - SowetanLIVE
articles.description: American rapper and actor Earl Simmons, known by the stage name DMX or Dark Man X, died on Friday at age 50.
